item.witcher_rpg.silver_witcher_sword.de: Deals magic silver damage to undead targets.
item.witcher_rpg.meteorite_witcher_sword: Deals magic silver damage to undead targets.
item.witcher_rpg.meteorite_silver_witche: Deals magic silver damage to undead targets.
item.witcher_rpg.aerondight_sword.descri: Deals magic silver damage to undead targets.
The blade charges up with every hit (max. 10 charges).
Gaining damage, spell crit chance and spell crit damage.
When fully charged, deals magic damage per hit.
effect.witcher_rpg.aerondight_charge.des: Increases attack damage, spell crit chance & spell crit damage per stack.
effect.witcher_rpg.quen_shield.descripti: Gives absorption and clears negative status effects.
effect.witcher_rpg.magical_trap.descript: Reduces movement speed and damages undead targets.
effect.witcher_rpg.axii.description: Incapacitates the target and makes it mor vulnerable to damage.
effect.witcher_rpg.adrenaline_gain.descr: Increases attack damage and sign intensity per stack.
effect.witcher_rpg.quen_explode.descript: Gives absorption and reflects some of the damage back to the attacker.
spell.witcher_rpg.quen.name: Quen
spell.witcher_rpg.quen.description: Gives you a absorption effect for {effect_duration} seconds and clears all negativ status effects.
spell.witcher_rpg.yrden.name: Yrden
spell.witcher_rpg.yrden.description: Slows enemies for {cloud_duration} seconds, trapping and damaging undead creatures.
spell.witcher_rpg.igni.name: Igni
spell.witcher_rpg.igni.description: Compromised pyrokinetic burst that ignites enemies and deals {damage} fire-damage.
spell.witcher_rpg.aard.name: Aard
spell.witcher_rpg.aard.description: Telekinetic thrust that knocks targets back and deals {damage} lightning-damage.
spell.witcher_rpg.axii.name: Axii
spell.witcher_rpg.axii.description: Makes the target incapacitated and more vulnerable for damage for {effect_duration} seconds.
spell.witcher_rpg.aard_sweep_frost.name: Aard Frost Sweep
spell.witcher_rpg.aard_sweep_frost.descr: Deals {damage}_0 lightning- and {damage}_1 frost-damage in a 360 radius,chance to freeze targets solid.
spell.witcher_rpg.aard_frost.name: Aard Frost Sweep
spell.witcher_rpg.aard_frost.description: Deals {damage}_0 lightning- and {damage}_1 frost-damage, frosts targets.
spell.witcher_rpg.igni_firestream_melt.d: Stream of fire, melts the targets armor, deals {damage} fire-damage.
spell.witcher_rpg.rend.name: Rend
spell.witcher_rpg.rend.description: Heavy strike that deals {damage} physical-damage, scales with adrenaline.
spell.witcher_rpg.strong_attack.name: Strong Attack
spell.witcher_rpg.strong_attack.descript: Strong attack with the sword, deals {damage} physical-damage.
spell.witcher_rpg.crippling_strike.name: Crippling Strike
spell.witcher_rpg.crippling_strike.descr: Fast strike, deals {damage} physical-damage and cripples the targets.
spell.witcher_rpg.whirl.name: Whirl
spell.witcher_rpg.whirl.description: Spinning and dealing {damage} physical-damage. The more adrenaline you have, the faster you move.
advancements.more_rpg_content.silver_swo: How do you like that silver?
advancements.more_rpg_content.steel_swor: You'll choke to death on 3 pounds of steel!
advancements.more_rpg_content.aerondight: For centuries it lays in these depths, waiting for you.
advancements.rpg_classes.kaer_morhen_arm: Obtain all Kaer Morhen Set parts.
